title: Ticket #1159: Allow VMUniverse jobs to be co-scheduled by the dedicated scheduler
description: The notion of "universe" is overloaded. For some things, like "parallel" or "local", it means how the job is scheduled. For others, like "java" or "VM", it refers to aspects of how Condor runs the job. Some users would like to be able to run parallel VM Universe or Java jobs.
remarks:
